full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RGYAL BA'I BSTAN SRUNG CHEN PO DAM CAN RDO RJE LEGS PA RNAM GSUM LA MCHOD GTOR 'BUL TSUL 'PHRIN LAS RAB 'BYAMS LHUN GYIS GRUB PA'I BSAM 'PHEL DBANG GI RGYAL PO ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @039B (CES RGYAL BA'I BSTAN SRUNG CHEN PO DAM CAN RDO RJE LEGS PA RNAM GSUM LA MCHOD GTOR 'BUL TSUL 'PHRIN LAS RAB 'BYAMS LHUN GYIS GRUB PA'I BSAM 'PHEL DBANG GI RGYAL @040A *, ,PO ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI CHOS SKYONG LA MNGA' BRNYES PA'I DAM PA RNAMS KYI GSUNG LAS BTUS NAS 'DI LA DAM CAN NOR BDAG TU SGRUB TSUL MI 'DRA BA 'GA' MCHIS PA LAS RIG 'DZIN CHEN PO NUS LDAN RDO RJE'AM STAG SHAM PAR GRAGS PA'I GTER BYON GYI DAM CAN NOR SGRUB DGOS 'DOD KUN 'BYUNG GI LUGS LTAR BCUG CING, DE LAS GZHAN YANG BZLOG BSGYUR TSOGS MCHOD GSHEGS GTOR GA-YANG 'GUGS DANG BCAS PA CUNG ZAD RGYAS PAR BYAS TE PADMA RGYAL PO RTZAL GYIS RANG GI LHA GSOL DANG, DAM CAN BRTEN PA RNAMS LA NYE BAR MKHO BAR BSAM NAS KLAG BDE BAR SBYAR BA'O, ,'DIS KYANG DAM CAN SKYES BU CHEN POS SKYE BA KUN TU GA-YEL BA MED PAR GROGS MDZAD PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
